elements.name: To verify the appearence of validation message after not passing the Edition from sign up screen1.

steps.name: user is already on Sign Up Screen
user enters "Megha","Jain","megha@yopmail.com","megha@yopmail.com","Megha_1132","Chetu@123" and "Chetu@123" into mandatory fields except Edition
user tries to sign up
appropriate message in a pop up related to please select the Edition should get displayed
sign up user should stay in sign up screen 1 only

elements.name: To verify the validation message after passing username of less than 6 characters from sign up screen1.

steps.name: user is already on Sign Up Screen
user enters valid "Free Edition","C.P","Gulati","Cp@yopmail.com","Cp@yopmail.com","Chetu@123" and "Chetu@123" including "pampa"
user tries to sign up
appropriate validation message related to the invalid username length should get displayed
sign up user should stay in sign up screen 1 only

elements.name: To verify the appearence of validation message when less than 6 characters has been passed in password and confirm password textfields while user is trying to sign up from Signup Screen 1.

steps.name: user is already on Sign Up Screen
user enters valid "Free Edition","Megha","Jain","megha@yopmail.com","megha@yopmail.com","Megha_1132" and "1234","1234"
user tries to sign up
appropriate validation message related to the invalid length of passwords should get displayed into the sign up screen 1
sign up user should stay in sign up screen 1 only

elements.name: To verify the appearence of validation message after passing the invalid combination of email address into both valid email and confirm email textfields from Signup Screen 1.

steps.name: user is already on Sign Up Screen
user enters valid data in "Free Edition","Megha","Jain","pampas_1132","Chetu@123" and "Chetu@123" and invalid "megha@yopmail.com","meghas@yopmail.com" fields
user tries to sign up
appropriate validation message should get displayed related to the invalid combination of emails into the sign up screen 1
sign up user should stay in sign up screen 1 only
